item.title: Demos
item.description: Recetario Before a patient can complete a Task, it has to be assigned to them. Recetario is our lightweight app that can be integrated into your EHR, to allow clinicians to quickly and easily select Forms, Surveys, and Questionnaires, and send them to the patient to be completed.
